Desc.eng: Finally! Did you get the heart?
Most of it. It’s a bit scratched and mostly rotten, but it might just do the trick.
Would you look that? A cheerful ghost! But your false delight can’t hide your biggest fear! You know that darkness will eventually devour you!
Can I have a word with you before she tears you apart? I only summoned and killed the ghoul to get rid of another monster. Not because you asked me to. Behave, or I’ll deal with you as well.
I don’t care about your empty threats. Give me the heart. Now.
Here! Take it, and now go.
I won’t participate in your dark rituals. I’m keeping the heart.
Careful, hunter. You’ll regret this one day… Sooner than you’d expect.
